lemma LocalSecretsComposition_neg1: assumes "subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}" and "correctCompositionLoc PQ" and h1:"\<forall> m. ks = kKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (kE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (kE m))" and h2:"\<forall> m. ks = sKS m \<longrightarrow> (\<not> ine P (sE m) \<and> \<not> ine Q (sE m))" and "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets P" and "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets Q" shows "ks \<notin> LocalSecrets PQ"
